model_info.name: Lung Sound Classification Model
model_info.description: TensorFlow Lite model for classifying lung sounds into normal, wheeze, crackle, and both categories

input_spec.description: Mel-spectrogram features (64 mel bands, 87 time frames)
input_spec.preprocessing: mel-spectrogram with 8kHz sample rate, 512 FFT, 256 hop length

output_spec.description: Probability distribution over 4 lung sound classes

training_info.dataset: Combined lung sound datasets (ICBHI, custom recordings)

clinical_validation.notes: Model requires clinical validation before medical use
